keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
#向上滚动半页 默认u
map w scrollPageUp

#向下滚动半页 默认d
map s scrollPageDown

#关闭当前页
map d removeTab

#恢复关闭网页
map x restoreTab

向上滚动一页
map <c-b> scrollFullPageUp

#在一个新标签中打开一个链接并切换到它
map <a-g> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab

#在隐藏窗口打开链接
map <a-t> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito

#将<Escape>密钥传递给网页本身
map <c-]> passNextKey

#有任何可听见的未静音选项卡，则它们将被静音。否则，所有静音选项卡都会取消静音 
map X toggleMuteTab all
#与第一种情况相同，只是不考虑当前选项卡 
map Y toggleMuteTab other

#打开一个隐身页面
map M createTab incognito

#打开一个新窗口并打开地址
map W createTab window http://www.bbc.com/news

#绕过缓存重新加载
map R reload hard

# <a-f>在新页面中打开多个链接
#<a-m>静音
#<a-p>固定标签

#按数字键打开链接
map 1 createTab file:///C:/Users/adang/Documents/%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%E5%90%8C%E6%AD%A5%E6%96%87%E4%BB%B6%E5%A4%B9/%E5%B8%B8%E7%94%A8%E7%BD%91%E5%9D%80.md
map 2 createTab https://www.zhihu.com/
map 3 createTab https://www.douban.com/
map 4 createTab https://www.bilibili.com/account/dynamic
map 5 createTab https://www.inoreader.com/folder/01.%E7%BD%91%E5%BF%97
map 6 createTab https://weibo.com/mygroups?gid=3684537454484607&wvr=6&leftnav=1&isspecialgroup=1
map 7 createTab https://workflowy.com/#/cb03b471db95
map 8 createTab https://post.smzdm.com/
map 9 createTab https://www.v2ex.com/tag/cmder
nextPatterns: next,more,newer,>,›,→,»,≫,>>,下一页,下一頁,下1页,下1頁,下页,下頁,翻页,翻頁,翻下頁,翻下页,下一张,下一張,下一幅,下一章,下一节,下一節,下一篇,后一页,後一頁,前进,下篇,后页,往后,Next,Next Page,次
previousPatterns: prev,previous,back,older,<,‹,←,«,≪,<<,上一页,上一頁,上1页,上1頁,上页,上頁,翻上頁,翻上页,上一张,上一張,上一幅,上一章,上一节,上一節,上一篇,前一页,前一頁,后退,後退,上篇,previous Page,
searchEngines:
#O，再按相应字母（注意大小写）指定搜索引擎搜索输入内容
W: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
D: http://www.baidu.com/s?wd=%s 百度
A: http://www.baidu.com/#ie={inputEncoding}&wd=%s 百度
B: https://cn.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
Z: https://www.zhihu.com/search?type=content&q=%s 知乎
O: https://www.douban.com/search?source=suggest&q=%s 豆瓣
I: https://search.bilibili.com/all?keyword=%s B站
V: https://cn.bing.com/search?q=site%3Awww.v2ex.com+%s v2ex
Y: http://so.yinyuetai.com/?keyword=%s 音悦台
F: http://fanyi.baidu.com/#en/zh/%s 翻译
J: https://search.jd.com/Search?keyword=%s&enc=utf-8 京东搜索
X: https://s.weibo.com/weibo/%s?topnav=1&wvr=6&b=1 新浪微博
T: https://s.taobao.com/search?q=%s 淘宝 


# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps

# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
